summary: A cute Breton female with stylish body paint and HDT hair.
descriptionHtml:
Here is my humble offering to the database of RaceMenu character presets. I wanted a shorter female character, specifically of the Breton race. She is excellent as a Sorcerer Bard but can be tweaked and outfitted to your preference.


[b][size=3]Required mods:[/size][/b]

[list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/][size=2][b]HDT Physics Extensions by HydrogensaysHDT[/b][/size][/url]
[*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][size=2][b]Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)[/b][/size][/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/][size=2][b]RaceMenu by Expired[/b][/size][/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/][size=2][b]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/b][/size][/url][b] (1)[/b]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/][size=2][b]The Eyes Of Beauty by LogRaam[/b][/size][/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/][size=2][b]Seductive Lips HD by EcthelionOtW[/b][/size][/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/][size=2][b]KS Hairdos - HDT Physics by Stealthic[/b][/size][/url][b] (2)[/b]
[*][url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/seren4xx/15342092530/][size=2][b]SRG Female Textures by Seren4XX[/b][/size][/url][b] (3)[/b]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49979/][size=2][b]Rutah Tattoo Pack for RaceMenu by Rutah[/b][/size][/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28740/][size=2][b]THEHAGs Privat Tattoos for UNP by THEHAG[/b][/size][/url][b] (4)[/b]
[/list]
[size=1][b](1)[/b] You could PROBABLY use a different body, but the preset is designed for this one which I personally feel is the best.
[b](2)[/b] You can also optionally install the non-HDT [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies[/url] for more hair options, however this preset
uses one of the moving hairs from the HDT version. They work together though.
[b](3)[/b] Extract femalebody_1.dds, femalebody_1_msn.dds, femalehands_1.dds, femalehands_1_msn.dds, femalehead.dds, and femalehead_msn.dds
to Skyrim\Data\Textures\Actors\Character\female (make backups of your originals if you like).
Ignore the mod's optional folders unless you know what you are doing.
[b](4)[/b] Also makes excellent [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41210/]Facial Warpaints[/url] though not used in this preset.[/size]


[b][size=3]Highly recommended:[/size][/b]

[list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72581/][size=2][b]Illustrious HDT Cloaks of Skyrim by Euphy[/b][/size][/url][b] (1)[/b]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442/][size=2][b]zzjay's wardrobe by zzjay[/b][/size][/url][b] (2)[/b]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7305/][size=2][b]UNP Female Armors by Exeter[/b][/size][/url][b] (3)[/b]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/][size=2][b]Immersive Armors by Hothtrooper44[/b][/size][/url][b] (4)[/b]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24235/][size=2][b]Phinix Natural ENB by Phinix[/b][/size][/url][b] (5)[/b]
[/list]
[size=1][b](1)[/b] Requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/]Cloaks of Skyrim by Noodles[/url] loaded first. Do not pack the loose files from Illustrious HDT Cloaks into a .BSA,
the physics won't work. Also, avoid giving them to followers.
[b](2)[/b] Seen in the screenshots (pirate outfit and thigh boots).
[b](3)[/b] All the default game armors completely rebuilt for the female UNP body (like the fur armor variant seen in the screenshots).
[b](4)[/b] Make sure to install the optional UNP support.
[b](5)[/b] My own ENB preset, with many code changes and features not found in others.[/size]


[b][size=3]Installation:[/size][/b]

[list]
[*][size=2]Extract PhinixBretonGirl.jslot to Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets[/size]
[*][size=2]Start a new game. Change sex to female and race to Breton FIRST ([u]important[/u]).[/size]
[*][size=2]Click Load Preset and select PhinixBretonGirl.[/size]
[*][size=2]Make any changes you like.[/size]
[/list]

Enjoy!
author: Phinix
